title: No more airplane mode? EU to allow calls on flights
description: EU airlines will be able to install equipment that lets them provide 5G on board planes by June 2023.

title: Kanye West no longer to buy Parler social media platform
description: The rapper has repeatedly made anti-Semitic remarks, alienating business partners and fans.

title: India seizes opportunities in African healthcare
description: The rapid expansion of Indian healthcare firms in Africa has not been without problems.
